examples: She wore a beautiful dress to the party.
He wrote her a beautiful love letter.

suggested: I was trying to think of a joke about beautiful hair, but it was a hair-raising experience.
It's a shame that we live in a world where the concept of beauty is so narrow and unrealistic.
Why do we have to constantly remind ourselves and others that beauty is more than skin deep? Can't we just accept it as a fact and move on?
Did you know that the word 'beautiful' comes from the Latin word 'bellus', which means 'pretty'?
The smell of beautiful flowers in the spring.
The feeling of beautiful silk on your skin.
The connection we feel to nature when we witness a beautiful sunset or a breathtaking landscape.
